title: CAEDC Interactive Data Map
image-alt: screen shot of the Interactive Data Map web map application
teaser: The Interactive Data Map was developed for the Cumberland County Economic Development Corporation to promote the County to prospective businesses.  It features a custom deployment of the Esri Shortlist Storytelling web map application.

title: Cumberland County Recycling & Disposal Map
image-alt: screenshot of the Residential Recycling & Disposal web mapp application
teaser: This web map application was developed using Leaflet.js to assist residents of Cumberland County learn about solid waste disposal and recycling in ther municipality.  The map's theme is based upon the BootLeaf project.

title: PAMAGIC Members Map
image-alt: screen shot of the PaMAGIC members web map application
teaser: This interactive web map showcases members of the Pennsylvania Mapping and Geographic Information Consortium.  It was built using the Esri JavaScript API and the Esri Calcite Maps theme.
